column1: #Text=Parajet Skycar expedition takes off from London to Timbuktu
#Text=The Waterman Aerobile #6 , seen here in the Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center , was an earlier attempt at a flying car .
#Text=Two explorers have set off from Knightsbridge , London Wednesday morning ( 0900 GMT ) in a propeller-powered dune buggy heading for the Sahara .

#Text=Giles Cardozo , age 29 , from Dorset , with chief pilot and expedition leader Neil Laughton , age 45 , an ex-SAS officer , will fly and drive the amazing two-seater vehicle more than 6,000-km ( 3,750-miles ) to fabled Timbuktu on February 20 .
#Text=" I just ca n't wait to see their faces when we fly in and start playing football with them .

#Text=Skycar spokeswoman , Charlie Bell , however clarified that the team was  in liaison with the CAA and they are looking to finalize the permit , " adding that it is in order for the rest of the trip .

column1: #Text=The Skycar will thereafter fly over the high-altitude Pyrenees near Andorra , and would cross over the 14-km ( nine-mile ) Strait of Gibraltar .
#Text=The prepared journey also includes the route through Mauritania , Atlas Mountains in Morocco and into Mali .
#Text=It will further cross the harsh environment of Sahara ’s remote “ Rub ' al Khali " ( empty quarter ) , for up to two weeks amid real fears of terrorist attacks .
#Text=" We 're going to have to cope with wind chill temperatures as low as -30 deg C and blistering heat of up to 50 deg C.
